content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide your annual contracts registers (such as those published online for the current year of all contracts worth over £5,000), for the period 2011-2022.
Yours faithfully,
Bo Jacobs Strom

Dear Bo Jacobs Strom,
Thank you for your request for information relating to contract register
2011-2022 which we received on 26/07/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 23/08/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: Bo Jacobs Strom <[FOI #1008703 email]>
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2023 11:38 AM
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Historical Contracts Registers
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide your annual contracts registers (such as those published
online for the current year of all contracts worth over £5,000), for the
period 2011-2022.
Yours faithfully,
Bo Jacobs Strom
-------------------------------------------------------------------
Please use this email address for all replies to this request:
[2][FOI #1008703 email]

requests to Sheffield City Council? If so, please contact us using this

be delayed.
If you find this service useful as an FOI officer, please ask your web
manager to link to us from your organisation's FOI page.

1 Attachment
Contracts Register extracted 31.07.23.xlsx
92K
Download
View as HTML
Dear Bo Jacobs Strom,
Thank you for your request for information relating to contract register
2011-2022 which we received on 26/07/2023.
Please find Sheffield City Council’s response to your request set out
below:
Please find attached a report extracted from the contract register held on
the online procurement portal utilised by the Council.  Unfortunately the
available data does not date back as far as requested, due to a previous
change of IT platform.
The Council does publish all spend over £250, dating back to the requested
timescale: [1]Council spend over £250 - Data Mill North
The information you have requested in the time frame prior to the attached
report is exempt from disclosure under section 12 of the Freedom of
Information Act 2000. Sheffield City Council does hold the information you
have requested. However, we do not record the information in a format that
allows us to produce an electronic report of this. Therefore, we would
have to carry out a manual search of our records. This would exceed the
cost limit of 18 hours or £450 specified in the [2]Freedom of Information
and Data Protection (Appropriate Limit and Fees) Regulations 2004 (SI 2004
No. 3244).
Under section 16 of the Freedom of Information Act 2000, we have a duty to
provide advice and assistance to requesters. Please see the above link
which includes spend above £250 which dates back to the requested time
period.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [3]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[4]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [5][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: FOI
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2023 10:42 AM
To: Bo Jacobs Strom <[FOI #1008703 email]>
Subject: Re – Freedom of Information Request – Reference – FOI / 895813
Dear Bo Jacobs Strom,
Thank you for your request for information relating to contract register

The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you

us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ

From: Bo Jacobs Strom <[7][FOI #1008703 email]>
Sent: Wednesday, July 26, 2023 11:38 AM

Subject: Freedom of Information request - Historical Contracts Registers
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide your annual contracts registers (such as those published

Yours faithfully,
Bo Jacobs Strom
-------------------------------------------------------------------
